title: New & MPfree: Keep Shelly In Athens – Lazy Noon
content:
This new track from everyone’s favourite Greek pop duo, Keep Shelly In Athens, is set to feature on their upcoming 12″ EP Our Own Dream.

Lazy Noon is a funky vocal driven affair, with the multi-layered beat proving hypnotically repetitive, serving to lull the listener into a dream inducing state. Imagine Portishead pumped with gallons of sugary sweets and anti-depressants, then dolled up in gear from Ann Summers, and you begin to understand the overall feel to the elegantly languid Lazy Noon. With what has already been a fantastic year for the duo beginning to draw to a close, the release of Our Own Dream is only set to bring their sound to an even broader audience.

Check out Lazy Noon below, and download it for free.

Keep Shelly in Athens, “Lazy Noon” by The FADER
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
